Compiling JukeBox

To compile the JukeBox add the contents of the "jukebox/" folder to your build:

  • atomic_fifo.c
  • event_buffer.c
  • spmidi_jukebox.c

Integration with Song Content

The Mobileer Editor can output a MIDI song playlist to a file called "export/spmidi_jukebox_playlist.h". The JukeBox includes that file so that it can play from the playlist. This playlist contains an array songs that are referenced by an index.

The application program can include a file called "export/spmidi_jukebox_song_ids.h". It defines indices so that the programmer can reference songs by a named constant.

For an example JukeBox application see the file "examples/jukebox_demo.c".
